name: nearest-marker
title: Nearest Marker Tooltips

licenses.type: WTFPL â€“ Do What the Fuck You Want to Public License

description:
This plugin uses a tree structure to select the nearest marker and display it's tooltips, instead of relying on the marker's SVG shapes.
This code comes from Extended Heatmap Demo, with minor modifications: http://www.highcharts.com/demo/heatmap-canvas
